backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling access control, chatrooms, messages, users, and reactions with ordered maps and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature definitions, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all frontend files.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app root configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, 404 handling, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar picker dialog supporting uploads, Giphy search, and avatar updates with debounced requests.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat area handling message display, auto-scroll, replies, pinned video, and message sending logic.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player component with waveform visualization, playback controls, and metadata handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication state and login workflow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatrooms, messages, and reactions with helpers for user identity and data conversion.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables, dark mode, mobile input tweaks, and custom audio slider styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides utility to format numbers using compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Utilities for searching and fetching trending GIFs from the Giphy API with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty placeholder file for html2canvas loading logic.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Provides client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, and safe fallbacks if compression fails.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to build lightweight tweet previews with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements localStorage-based caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with validation, versioning, and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Offers utilities to extract IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generate corresponding thumbnail or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page requiring a password to view, delete, and reset chatrooms using query hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments its view count, handles loading/error states, and renders the ChatArea.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: React lobby page that lists chatrooms with search, category filtering, loading/error states, and navigation into individual chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current features, requirements, and pending requests for adding an admin reset-all-data function.
